subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which monument is the pride of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के सबसे बड़ा मंदिर कौन है ?
explanation_en:
Mehrangarh Fort is the largest and most prominent fort in Rajasthan, known for its rich history and beautiful architecture.
